snippet: The networks have experienced a slight improvement in prime-time viewing this fall, but the landscape is still treacherous for new shows, several of which have been pulled after just two episodes.
abstract: Every network has at least glimmer of a hit show three weeks into new fall television season, but in era of increased delayed viewing, patience over ratings is crucial; networks have slight improvement in prime-time viewing, but landscape is still treacherous for new shows, several of which have been pulled after just two episodes.
lead_paragraph: The networks have experienced a slight improvement in prime-time viewing this fall, but the landscape is still treacherous for new shows, several of which have been pulled after just two episodes.

headline.main: Fall TV Season Delivers a Mixed Bag in Prime Time
headline.print_headline: Fall TV Season Delivers a Mixed Bag in Prime Time
